EcoCrop is a relatively simple crop suitability model and as such is subject to various limitations, most notably, it does not include estimates of extreme climate impacts, soil fertility, pest and diseases, all of which can be critical to bean growth
79, 80 . ItÂ also does not provide information on crop productivity. Whilst the exclusion of these limitations likely means we underestimate climate change-related challenges for bean production, we argue that they are useful to identify key adaptation priorities for the region.
